nodes.text: Jason was an individual who, at one point prior to 22 BBY, had received a pin-up of a female Rodian.

The name "Jason" is included within a message written in Aurebesh on a pin-up poster of a female Rodian. Displayed on the top-right corner of the image, the message reads, "To Jason X0X0". The poster first appears in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars episode "Lethal Trackdown," where it is seen from far away and the Aurebesh caption is barely readable. The poster is first seen in close-up in an unidentified cantina in "Pursuit of Peace."
